greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Beginning position of n in the decimal expansion of the Copeland-Erdos constant.
comment: Same as A165449 but including the a(0) term.
link: Eric W. Weisstein, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..999
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Copeland-Erdos Constant Digits
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Constant Digit Scanning
program: s = "".join(str(p) for p in primerange(1, plimit+1))
return [1+s.find(str(n)) for n in takewhile(lambda i: str(i) in s, count(0))]
xref: Cf. A033308 (decimal expansion of the Copeland-Erdos constant).
Cf. A165449 (same sequence but omitting the a(0) term).
results.author: _Eric W. Weisstein_, Sep 15 2013
